message.body: Ok! So we had a stop to pick up people in Vegas, and the flight is delayed b/c of high winds. So we're supposed to leave here at 2:50:(:(
Ah shit!! What time will you get in, do you think? I will probably check in at some point before you get here, then.
Dee says to check in under her name. The room might not be ready quite yet though. Use her name
Oh wait, 4:10!!! If we take off on time

Ok got it! I think I am going to rent a car for a few hours and go to this state park outside the city for a little hike. Then I'll come back to the airport and meet you and we can las Vegas from there?? Just keep me posted about when you'll get here?
Ok! A very good plan! I'll keep you updated!
Any snack requests over there? I'm by a grocery store...I got goldfishes
I brought a ton of stuff...but can you get Cheese its?
Nice!! I'm heading back to drop the car, meet you by the baggage claim/ground transportation?
FYI, dee was really sick on the flight
Ok, at the cab stand with Jen
When you come out go left to the entrance (at the end)
